About Me



Intro

What I am all about.

My name is Aristote Botalibo Mbedi.
I'm a Full stack web developer who lives currently in Los Angeles. I have serious passion for UI effects, and animations, creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences, and also enjoy working on the back-End with NodeJs. I am a simple guy always ready to learn something new.
